channel.title: Npc drops?!?
channel.description: ok, i need to know how to change what an npc drops. can anyone help me? i just added barrows to my server and they didnt drop anything i want ahrims to drop part of ahrims and then oter times drop the rest of it. is this possible if not i'll just do with it dropping all of ahrims.
